content: But when we look at things like the construction of our new facility, the launch into the United States, the launch of Mia, China, what we're doing in aesthetic breast recon and all of the growth initiatives we have out in front of us and we lay that against what we believe we needed to spend against those and then the capital which the Oaktree financing has given us, we believe there is more than sufficient room to get to a breakeven point and actually start being cash flow positive with what we currently have.
